law.catch_line: Kentucky Board of Tax Appeals created.
law.text: There is hereby created an administrative review agency which shall be known as the "Kentucky Board of Tax Appeals." It is attached to the Public Protection Cabinet for administrative purposes, except as provided in KRS 131.330.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 93, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 168. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 1.
